column4: sup guys.. i'm with ubuntu here i'd like to try kubuntu.. is it ok just to install the kubuntu-desktop metapackage?

hello guys, i've installed kubuntu-desktop on my ubuntu and now i want to remove it but when i try to remove kubuntu-desktop only the metapackage is removed.. how to remove all kde apps installed with kubunut-desktop?
but only the metapackage is removed
you'll want to use debfoster, just like Seveas said.
